com.google.android.drdat.cl.DrdatUpdateSchedule

DrdatUpdateSchedule Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Presents a login form so that a participant can make a web query to the smi to update their task list and reminder schedule.

This uses DrdatSmi2TaskList to update the schedule for tasks. This will also grab form data for each task for that user.

Author:
cal
